text:
Thomas Stanley Holland (born 1 June 1996) is an English actor and dancer. He is best known for playing Spider-Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe movies, ' (2016), ' (2017), ' (2018), ' (2019), and ' (2019). He also stared in the famous musical Billie Elliot (2008)
Holland was diagnosed with dyslexia in 2003.
Early Life.
Holland has three younger brothers: Harry, Sam, and Patrick (Paddy). His parents are Nicola Frost and Dominic Holland. He has said he was bullied in school for being a dancer.
Personal Life.
Tom Holland lives in London. He has a dog named Tessa that he loves dearly. He practices gymnastics.
